Company: University of California San Francisco Medical Center (UCSF)
Description of incident: A total of 3,541 patients were affected by the September 10 theft of an unencrypted laptop from an employee's vehicle.  A subset of the 3,541 patients who were affected had their Social Security numbers exposed.UPDATE (10/08/2013): Paper documents with patient names, Social Security numbers, dates of birth, and medical information were also stolen.
